code: import Loader from'react-loader-spinner';import'react-loader-spinner/dist/loader/css/react-spinner-loader.css';import'./index.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var apiStatusConstants={initial:'INITIAL',success:'SUCCESS',failure:'FAILURE',inProgress:'IN_PROGRESS'};var ProfileDetails=function ProfileDetails(props){var renderProfile=function renderProfile(){var profileDetail=props.profileDetail;var name=profileDetail.name,profileImageUrl=profileDetail.profileImageUrl,shortBio=profileDetail.shortBio;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-details-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:profileImageUrl,alt:"profile",className:"profile-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"profile-name",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"profile-bio",children:shortBio})]});};var renderProfileFailure=function renderProfileFailure(){var getProfileDetails=props.getProfileDetails;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-failure-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"retry-button",type:"button",onClick:getProfileDetails,children:"Retry"})});};var renderProfileLoader=function renderProfileLoader(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loader-container-profile","data-testid":"loader",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{type:"ThreeDots",color:"#ffffff",height:"50",width:"50"})});};var profileApiStatus=props.profileApiStatus;switch(profileApiStatus){case apiStatusConstants.inProgress:return renderProfileLoader();case apiStatusConstants.success:return renderProfile();case apiStatusConstants.failure:return renderProfileFailure();default:return null;}};export default ProfileDetails;
